quote: Change only happens in the present moment. The past is already done. The future is just energy and intention.
name: Kino MacGregor

quote: Move your joints every day. You have to find your own tricks. Bury your mind deep in your heart, and watch the body move by itself.
name: Dharma Mittra

quote: The body benefits from movement, and the mind benefits from stillness.
name: Sakyong Mipham

quote: Remember, it doesn’t matter how deep into a posture you go — what does matter is who you are when you get there.
name: Max Strom

quote: Yoga is not about self-improvement. It’s about self-acceptance.
name: Gurmukh Kaur Khalsa

quote: The soul is here for its own joy.
name: Rumi

quote: The attitude of gratitude is the highest yoga.
name: Yogi Bhajan
